Perjury

Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The jury in Barry Bonds’s perjury trial finished its third day of deliberations Tuesday, leaving the courthouse without giving any hints to which way it was leaning.
snippet: The jury in Barry Bonds’s perjury trial finished its third day of deliberations Tuesday, leaving the courthouse without giving any hints to which way it was leaning.
